name: Tofu
pros: Tofu is a good source of protein and contains all nine essential amino acids.
It is also a valuable plant source of iron and calcium and the minerals manganese, selenium, phosphorous, magnesium, copper, zinc and vitamin B1.
Soy isoflavones present in tofu reduce the levels of LDL "bad" cholesterol.
The calcium and magnesium in soy may help strengthen bones, lessen symptoms of PMS, regulate blood sugar, and prevent migraine headaches.
It also provides small amounts of thiamin, riboflavin, niacin, vitamin B-6, choline, manganese, and selenium.
